page.title: 01Review Crosthwaite 'area'
page.content: This 3x4km.block lies 7 miles west of {Kendal,}6 miles south of{Windermere and 5 miles north of the{Kent {Estuary,}in{Cumbria.}The whole area is very picturesque with its well stocked farms, its grazing land,its rocky outcrops and small woodlands.It is rich in wild life,both flora and fauna.Part of{Crosthwaite,}part of {Cartmel Fell}<with its pretty hamlet of{Bowland Bridge>}and part of the renowned and beautiful{Lyth Valley}is incorporated.We researched six important elements which influence the life of the inhabitants,namely,Farming Trade,Employment,Lifestyles,Recreation and Tourism.We interviewed three well known personalities, asked for a piece of local dialect and gathered some people's concerns for the future of this{Cumbrian}rural area.
